Package org.lwjgl.system.linux

Class XUnmapEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.system.linux.XUnmapEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class XUnmapEvent
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Member documentation

    • serial – # of last request processed by server
    • send_event – true if this came from an X11.XSendEvent(long, long, boolean, long, org.lwjgl.system.linux.XEvent) request
    • display – Display the event was read from

    Layout

    
 struct XUnmapEvent {
     int type;
     unsigned long serial;
     Bool send_event;
     Display * display;
     Window event;
     Window window;
     int from_configure;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • XUnmapEvent

        public XUnmapEvent​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a XUnmapEvent instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
